video_generation_prompt.module_focus: Incident Management with 8D Problem Solving Methodology

video_specifications.target_audience: Safety managers, EHS professionals, corporate executives

key_features_to_highlight.description: Advanced incident reporting system with 17 different incident types including injury, near miss, environmental, and equipment failure
Industry-standard 8-discipline problem-solving process for systematic incident investigation
visual_elements: Root cause analysis tools (5 Whys, Fishbone, Fault Tree)

key_features_to_highlight.description: Advanced risk scoring with probability and impact assessment, automated risk level calculation
Comprehensive financial tracking with 13 cost categories and budget impact assessment
Built-in compliance tracking for OSHA, ISO 45001, ISO 14001, and local regulations
Real-time dashboards with trend analysis, performance metrics, and predictive insights

technical_capabilities.details: Django REST Framework with PostgreSQL database, Redis caching, and Celery task processing
React TypeScript with Ant Design components, responsive design for mobile and desktop
OpenAI and Anthropic integration for intelligent incident analysis and recommendations
Role-based permissions, audit logging, secure file attachments, and data encryption
Microservices architecture supporting multi-project environments with Docker deployment
